tree.name: John Collins
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: LAC got Collins from Jazz; Heat got Powell from LAC; Jazz got Kevin Love, Kyle Anderson, and a 2027 LAC 2nd from Heat

assetsGivenUp.name: Keon Johnson
